analysis.key_quote: Keeping the civil service nonpartisan is critical to every citizen, of whatever political persuasion, because the alternative leads to open bias and potential persecution and government service only to “our people” who are in power at the time.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and warns against the dangers of politicization, which aligns with concerns about merit-based systems and due process protections.
